content: A few more recommendations that I feel would be important for Designers: Gene : An Intimate story by Siddhartha Mukherjee. A Primer on Genetics for laymen. Especially with the dawn of new fields like Synthetic Biology and Biomimetics. The Tell Tale brain by V.S Ramachandran It’s the counterpart for Thinking Fast and Slow, Visual Designers would love to understand the neuroscience behind Art, Gestalt laws , Senses and Experiences. Zen mind Beginner’s mind by Shunryu Suzuki The philosophy of having a beginner’s mindset to look at problems from a different perspective. This book was one of Steve Job’s favourites , once you read this you’ll tend to follow a Minimalistic approach towards Designing.
